name: Happy Weed Farm
description:
Start your own underground business, your farm. Grow weed, sell it and take money, ease! You will have a farm for planting marijuana, it’s a holy herb which could make you a rich person. It’s a nice simulator of making money from weed.

Follow us in socials!
